website_summaries.verdict: These 20 floating candles have a lot to offer for the affordable price, including choice of color, larger size, and clean-burning wicks.
pros: A good pick for the budget-conscious, as you get a pack of 20 classic floating candles for an incredibly low price
4-inch diameter is a bit larger than others in this class
cons: Mixed reviews on burn time – some users say they burn longer than indicated
others say they have shorter burn times
Some packs contained candles that didn't float smoothly

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous floating candles!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered these candles because I didn't think I would be able to get to a store to buy them. I did end up getting a different brand from a store. These were supposed to be delivered Monday, and that was the night I needed them. They actually ended up being delivered the Saturday before. These candles however floated much better than the ones I bought from the store! I will definitely buy this brand again when I need floating candles.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Best Candles I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: These candles are over the top awesome. I bought 3 packs equaling 60 candles and used them at my son's wedding rehearsal dinner. When I received them I did a test run on one floating in a mason jar to see how long they would burn. 7 hours later, I blew it out and the candle was only about 1/3 used. I had 48 of them burning the night of the event which lasted about 4 hours and saved them because I can use them again for at least 4-8 more hours. Best candles I've ever seen in almost 60 years. Love, love, love them! Thanks for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Worked Amazingly
customer_reviews.text: I used this for centerpieces and isle runners in a wedding. They were very easy to set up, and when lit they burned evenly and stayed floating the entire time. very easy clean up, and true to color.
customer_reviews.author: Mallorey Dauley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The candles did not stay lit the entire time so I wasn't all together happy about that- they also didn't quite fill vase the way my mind had intended but that was my fault as I didn't measure the circumference of the vase prior to purchasing. Just one of those things you don't think about until you drop it in the water but still had the desired affect once they where lit.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, smaller floating candle
customer_reviews.text: These lasted for 6 hours + at an event I planned. Read the dimensions in the listing, these are smaller floating candles for narrower vessels. Hard to find in stores. The ones that were nearly done burning after over 6 hours were placed three per vessel in water. I imagine the extra heat of the other candles or a draft in the area caused them to burn faster. Just an FYI. Honestly, 6 hours is really good for such small candles! Others placed singularly were less than half burned after 6 hours. I saved them for personal use later!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon R.

customer_reviews.title: Love these for a baby shower I hosted
customer_reviews.text: Love these for a baby shower I hosted. They were absolutely what I was looking for. You can check me out on FB and IG @mariesplanning4U
customer_reviews.author: TMV

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have used them for several events. They burn all night! Some need to be re-lit, but I suspect that is because they get bumped and then maybe wet? I wouldn't buy any other brand. After the event, I take them home and use them till the burn out. So I'd say they burn at least 6-8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: angie kunze

customer_reviews.title: Wick no good
customer_reviews.text: Soooo, they sink pretty far down, but still work. My problem is the wick. I burned it for maybe half an hour last night and the wick fell down/off. Now I can’t burn the candle. The others also are having the wick flake too early making the flames really small. I’m not impressed. Oh. Did I mention, the flames crackle. I’ve never had a candle do it this consistently. Sounds like an electrical crackle and freaks me out every time.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in my centerpiece
customer_reviews.text: I create a Thanksgiving centerpiece that all my guest raved about it. I forgot to take pictures. It was several cylinders of varying heights. Each contained a slice of orange floating in the bottom, fresh cranberries and a stalk of rosemary. The candles were perfect. They lasted the entire evening with no waste, smoke or bad fumes. I am glad they were not scented because I think it would be unappetizing.
customer_reviews.author: S kafferly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Floating Candles
customer_reviews.text: I floated a few of these in a large flat bowl with floating fresh flowers. My guests exclaimed over this centerpiece. These candle are lovely with a small pretty flame. They burn a long time.
customer_reviews.author: marz

customer_reviews.title: Lasted more than 6 hours
customer_reviews.text: Used three in each large vase of submerged white roses. The light illuminated the white roses underneath beautifully in the dark. These candles lasted for the entire rehearsal dinner along with an after wedding evening party on the deck. Received so many compliments. The price on candles are high no matter where you look. Wish the prices could be lower. I chose this brand because the price was slightly lower and the reviews were higher. But with their longevity, the price was mostly justified.
customer_reviews.author: SuomiMommy

customer_reviews.title: Order more than u need
customer_reviews.text: Did not last the 3-4-5 hours like it says. Mine were weddding centerpieces and lasted approx 45 mins and hen they were done which stunk bc i didnt Have extra to put new ones in so for 3 of the hours at my wedding my centerpieces did not have lit floating candles
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Antiorio

customer_reviews.title: These candles were perfect! The candles lasted the entire 5 hours and ...
customer_reviews.text: These candles were perfect! The candles lasted the entire 5 hours and looked great! I set up various different clear glass vases as a centerpiece for each table; placed a silk flower (Gerber daisy, red) at the bottom, sticking up then placed river rocks and colored stones all around it & underneath it. Filed the vase with water and floated these candles, it was beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: The float beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my centerpieces at my wedding and they look amazing! The candles float in the center of the water with no issues and do not hug the sides of the vases, which I hate when that happens. I am very happy with this product and the price!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. They are just as described.
customer_reviews.text: These little floating candles were great for my purpose. I made ice snow globes that I put these candles in and let them burn. They used outside for a snowy wedding. They lasted 4-6 hours as long as they didn't get blown out by the wind. A good, easy to use product.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Buy if only need for an hour...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my centerpieces for my wedding reception. The candles lasted maybe an hour at most. My maid of honor had to relight them a couple times before we gave up throughout the 4 hours they were needed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela N

customer_reviews.title: Used in Mason Jar
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for the mason jar center pieces that we mad. The candle seemed to burn much longer than expected. I think our were burning for about 4 hours and did not seem to make a dent in the candles. Someone actually purchased the jars at the end of our event.
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Floatable???
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use for a special event. For some reason, half of them blew out. As they burn, they melt, letting in the water in which they were intended to float. I don't know whether they were defective or what. I won't be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: AZN8TV

customer_reviews.title: Long-burning & Safe
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I had used floating candles. I bought these for the mason jar candles I made by layering epsom salt, cranberries with a few pine sprigs, and topped with one of these candles, for our homeschool group Christmas Celebration. I had pretested one at home and it burned for almost 7 hours. All of the candles had to be blown out at the end of our event, so I still have them to burn at home. However, what I really liked was that these candles burn inward, so there is NO DRIP, making them very safe to use. :D I highly recommend these candles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The durability was incredible
customer_reviews.text: We use the candle for my brother's wedding. this candles burnt forever and were still on after the wedding end, longer than 6 hours. I will recommend buying these if you planned of having a complete ambience for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Agape Salako

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use the candles yet but know they work great! I was at a yard party at my sons house a couple of weeks ago and my daughter in law used them and they were great. They burn for a long time and didn't drip. That is the total reason I found the same ones to order
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put in mason jars and they do their job. We had them burning for about 6 hours or so and there was still plenty of candle left to burn. I can't wait to use these more often!
customer_reviews.author: T-A-L

customer_reviews.title: Used in hurricane vases of varied heights
customer_reviews.text: Floated in the water filled vase and did not sink or get lopsided. Burned evenly and were long lasting for our event. We felt the quality was significant and these are a good value. Nice visuals for table center
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: They burn forever
customer_reviews.text: I got these to put in dishes of water at my wedding but they are so small that I worried they wouldn't burn for more than an hour. I experimented with a couple and they burned for a minimum of six hours, a few lasted for 8! I tried swishing the water around and splashing them lightly but they didn't go out unless I basically shoved them under water. I feel confident that they'll last so long, we'll have to blow them out at the end of the night.
customer_reviews.author: ericka fetner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wedding. They lasted the entire night.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Actually floats
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my wedding centerpieces. They lasted a long time and floated the entire time. I was extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy Love

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Candles!
customer_reviews.text: These floating candles are perfect for my dining room centerpiece! They are small enough to fit in smaller dishes and look gorgeous while burning. They were also packaged well and arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.author: JKS Ranch

customer_reviews.title: These candles are fine, but they seem like they don't float as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my upcoming wedding. These candles are fine, but they seem like they don't float as well as other floating candles I have gotten. The candle sits lower in the water (more than half submerged). They do last for about 3 hours and they do burn pretty even.
customer_reviews.author: rkarlson1

customer_reviews.title: So cute for the DIY bride!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in today and tried it out as a DIY centerpiece... I’m so excited! I haven’t burned it for long but they look so pretty already. They are smaller, but I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Caroline Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my moms birthday party, this candle held up and stayed lite for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet elegant
customer_reviews.text: I will be using the candles for my daughter's wedding reception as centerpieces. I burned a candle in the centerpiece to see how long it lasted....I blew the candle out after 5 hours. It still held it's shape and light so I knew that this was the right choice for her 4 hour reception!
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Great floating candles!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty pleased with these floating candles. I wish they would’ve been a little bigger but that’s because I didn’t measure how big the vases would be and I bought these first. All in all, they lasted fairly long and looked beautiful in the vases!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Simple, elegant, long-lasting light
customer_reviews.text: Put these in our church windows this year in water with greenery and cranberries. They are a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: patish

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Awesome price. We used them for the center pieces for my daughter's quinceañera. They looked very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: chriskardaneli

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Used for my client’s in home birthday dinner ! Can’t wait to use again !
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah (@EventsParadiseOnline)

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These candles were just what I was looking for and looked beautiful in water-filled vases on the dinner table. Only issue is they can easily get wet and go out if someone shakes the table.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Witkin

customer_reviews.title: Floating candles - beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Christmas bowl that required floating candles for years. I brought it out this year determined to have it in the center of the dining room table, but I couldn't find floating candles anywhere. I was thrilled to be able to order the Bolsius pack of 20 white floating candles. Last night was our first dinner and the candles were perfect. The light was beautiful - the smell perfect - and they glowed throughout the dinner. I'll never be without floating candles again. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Laird

customer_reviews.title: Will Order Again...Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality candles. I used them during 2 church services, burning them for a total of 21/2 - 3 hours. I blew them out between services. They were floating in water. in a glass container. I will definitely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hardwick Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to go along with gold and red floating candles for a wintery centerpiece for our coffee table. They were the perfect size and color and they burned just fine when lit.
customer_reviews.author: Caylea

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Using these as centerpieces for my wedding!!!! Practiced with one and it lasted 7 hours!!!! Really nice candles
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like
customer_reviews.text: Just don’t like them. Prefer other kinds of snacks. They are not better than popcorn. Won’t be buying again
customer_reviews.author: G Litchfield

customer_reviews.title: Great floaters
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles they last a longtime and they float perfect.I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Monic Southern

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. Had to give 4 stars because a local craft store has them for $4 less, but they were sold out. I guess the convenience of Prime is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Williams

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I was truly surprised at how long lasting these were. They were used for a party and I bought extra thinking they would burn out quickly and would need replaced. We had them lit for approximately 6 hours and they were only partially melted
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hyndman

customer_reviews.title: Melted weird
customer_reviews.text: I put a bunch in a huge glass bowl and they all melted together which was kind of cool but unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for centerpieces for my wedding. They looked great and fit perfectly in the cut wine bottles that we had. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A Jones

customer_reviews.title: All seasons
customer_reviews.text: Even though they’re a bit lightweight, placing them in water looks lovely! I bought them for Christmas, but will use all year. Lasts for several hours; about 6-7. I keep the bag in the freezer and pop them in water whenever needed.
customer_reviews.author: peaceandsocialjustice

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time
customer_reviews.text: They are longlasting. They do go out a bit but I was using them outside and in water so both the breeze and water was factoring into that.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: perfect floating in water in a decorated clear glass vase ...
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and long lasting, perfect floating in water in a decorated clear glass vase or bowl. Ideal for a holiday or - in our case - a wedding celebration. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Two Skies

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting candle!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our son’s rehearsal dinner! They were lit for about four hours and I was surprised at how much candle was still left! They floated beautifully in our mason jars and gave a warm, inviting glow. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: The F5VES

customer_reviews.title: Job well done.
customer_reviews.text: These candles are really great and they look beautiful in the water. They did what they were supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful floating candle
customer_reviews.text: This was such a beautiful and elegant addition to our center piece. It floated on the water and was lit up for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Hadulaa

customer_reviews.title: The look.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. Easy to use and burns beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They float well and last a long time! Excellent price too! Arrived right on time! Very pleased, will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pro n con
customer_reviews.text: They did float, they didn’t melt quick but one thing I noticed is that they had to be turned on multiple times
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Used for wedding centerpieces
customer_reviews.text: These worked great! A girlfriend used them for her bridal shower and over a year later I was able to use the same ones (and bought another bag!) and they worked exactly as expected!! Even though my family joked I ordered a bag of eyeballs haha
customer_reviews.author: Betzi Sawchuk

customer_reviews.title: Partial review since we have not used them yet
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time, looks exactly as expected and we believe the price is fair. I cannot review performance yet, since the event it's a week away.
customer_reviews.author: LaPrietaRD

customer_reviews.title: Mine came all melted together
customer_reviews.text: Even the ones that were not damaged did not float well nor did they burn for very long. Threw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Beetle boomer

customer_reviews.title: How long candles last
customer_reviews.text: I am using these floating candles to put them in glass vases full of water for my wedding. I was a little nervous they wouldn’t last long enough for the day. I did a test run and turned one on at 4pm. They ended up turning off around midnight. About 8 hours. They ended up lasting longer than 5 hours, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: illuminate when placed in water really well
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, the products buoyancy/balance is perfect remains upright in water and the wick remains illuminated
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Rossetti

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use for my daughter's sweet 16 floating candle lighting setup. Easy to light, and lasted for hours.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcgovern

customer_reviews.title: Great Floating Candle
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Great candle. Burned for the entire duration of our party {5+ hours} and we had to blow them out. They are a perfect size and they float wonderfully. Will buy again ~ Thank you for a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rashelle Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Great transaction.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to put in bags for the wedding tables. Worked great and tables looked even better.
customer_reviews.author: Mary m

customer_reviews.title: These should work great for my evening outdoor wedding
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wedding table centerpiece. Did a test run to time the length of burn time. At 6 hours i had to leave so blew the candle out. Very impressed. These should work great for my evening outdoor wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Courtney

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t actually burned them yet but they float great and are very pretty. They also came pronto!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cute elegant luxurious candles
customer_reviews.text: Very cute elegant luxurious candles for floating . I will definitely buy it again and recommend to anybody who’s looking to buy cute elegant candles .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for events
customer_reviews.text: These lasted through our whole wedding reception and the float was level
customer_reviews.author: Queen Q

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love my floating candles and the price was right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These were very poor quality and did not work. They got wet right as they were lit due to poor engineering of this candle.
customer_reviews.author: Pia Mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good quantity for the price. Stayed lite throughout the entire event
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product was used for centerpieces at a nice dinner event
customer_reviews.text: This product was used for centerpieces at a nice dinner event. They added a very beautiful glow and lasted throughout the entire party, approximately 4 hours. These are a great alternative in short vases with water and glass beads. Sometimes flower centerpieces can interfere in communicating across a table. Will definitely order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Great floating candles
customer_reviews.text: The candles were great for my mason jars that I use outside. The price was awesome for the amount of candles I got. Definitely recommend this seller and brand! Karen H.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Short Burn Time
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the candles at all. They burned for just a short time--probably less than 3 hours. Supposedly, the seller was to credit my purchase for $10. Don't know if that has been done.
customer_reviews.author: Stitchin' Granny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Floating Candle
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, lasted a little over 6 hours. Make sure your water is level.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality floating candles.
customer_reviews.text: Looked beautiful on the Christmas table. Small, but thick so they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeGirl

customer_reviews.title: Cutest candles
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these candles for a diy bug repellent. They were perfect for what I needed. It fit perfectly in the mason jar. It did not need to be replaced for more than a week with daily use. The price point was perfect . 5 out of 5, would buy again . Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They don't actually, you know, FLOAT
customer_reviews.text: the bottoms of these candles are concave, not convex. As a result, they barely keep the wick above water before lighting, and very quickly burn enough wax to snuff themselves out in the water.
customer_reviews.author: dan2bit

customer_reviews.title: use for wedding decorations
customer_reviews.text: I am using them for wedding centerpiece. Very nice and easy to use. Plan i buying more.
customer_reviews.author: laura blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work in Pool
customer_reviews.text: I have used other pool candles before with no problems. These did not stay lit, and their shape actually allows for water to quickly enter. I wish I could return. Total waste of money. Rest are going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Marks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these candles for decorations at a graduation party. They are a great product and worth the price. And the price compared to other places it’s a good deal. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Float well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for my centerpieces at my wedding. Just tested them out and they seem to work very well. They float and burn well, though I can’t yet speak to how long they will burn.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: perfect water candles
customer_reviews.text: these lasted over 5 hours! I like the round shape, and that they do not have the metal on the outside like other tea candles. Looked amazing in a small mason jar with water.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed for my daughters wedding. I also tested them to see how long they would burn, they far exceeded the time noted, which was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Its exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Floats nicely, lasts for more than a single use. Stays afloat lit and when not lit. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Scheffer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I love floating candles and needed a good supply of them
customer_reviews.author: Katrina FreedTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: This product works really well.
customer_reviews.text: The candles float as advertised and look very pretty in the vases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Can’t wait to use for my wedding in October.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I finally came across these amazing candles!! They last 6 hours!! I have been using various floating candles in vases I use on my mantle for years and these are the best floating candles ever!! I will never buy another brand again. Thank you to the product creator!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase overall
customer_reviews.text: If you have a long event these may not be for you but they worked pretty well for mine. 2 hour burn without melting into the water.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Landin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: We used them in the baptismal fount to celebrate all the baptisms if the year. Worked great! We burnt them approximately an hour. Would have burned a bit longer than that I think.
customer_reviews.author: KJE

customer_reviews.title: Great candles; lasted a long time
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these candles for our wedding and they exceeded expectations. The reception was ~6 hours, and most of the candles lasted the whole time. Some of them went out early, but most of them (probably 80% or more) stayed lit. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Cook

customer_reviews.title: These are great floating candles as they burn for quite awhile
customer_reviews.text: These are great floating candles as they burn for quite awhile, unlike some others I have tried. They fit perfectly in my glass cylinders and look absolutely beautiful with three or four in a larger glass holder.
customer_reviews.author: Swiss

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and thickness of the candle better than some other floating candles I purchased in the past. I use them in mason jars filled with sandalwood oil, water, rosemary and lemons to repel mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Harrington

customer_reviews.title: floating candles
customer_reviews.text: They work as floating candles for our table center piece. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: SRodrigue

customer_reviews.title: Lasted six whole hours!
customer_reviews.text: I tested one before using them for my wedding. By trimming the wick and leaving it undisturbed it lasted for six whole hours. It'll be perfect for my wedding centerpieces!
customer_reviews.author: Sailboats

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered these for a family wedding and they were perfect for floating in the pint size mason jars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a family wedding and they were perfect for floating in the pint size mason jars.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy R.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our wedding!
customer_reviews.text: we got these to use in our wedding coming up in december- they look perfect in the centerpieces we designed :) very good quality- can't wait to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B

customer_reviews.title: nice color
customer_reviews.text: I like these candles and quality. the price is also good.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They were perfect for my bff's engagement party!
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Great candle
customer_reviews.text: Candles are the perfect size for what I needed them for. I haven’t burned one for very long but expect them to last quite nicely. Would definitely buy them again and recommend
customer_reviews.author: sarah k.

product_meta.title: Bolsius Unscented Floating Candles – Set of 20 White Floating Candles – Cute and Elegant Burning Candles – Candles with Nice and Smooth Flame – Party Accessories
product_meta.description:
When it comes to our customers’ satisfaction, we have one rule: settle for nothing but the best. That’s why we work only with premium quality products and manufacturers that are guaranteed to deliver to our high expectations.

Why should you order this product?
